Jean Bill Brown Joe Michele Best Imogene Dean Sent Wednesday April PM Subject Fw Center of the Bible Original Message From Tara Webster To GPTRScom GPTRScom Date Wednesday April PM Subject Center of the Bible I thought you would find this pretty intresting Maybe you have seen it before but i never had Center of the Bible What is the shortest chapter in the Bible Answer Psalms What is the longest chapter in the Bible Answer Psalms Which chapter is in the center of the Bible Answer Psalms Fact There are chapters before Psalms Fact There are chapters after Psalms Add these numbers up and you get What is the center verse in the Bible Answer Psalms Does this verse say something significant about Gods perfect will for our lives The next time someone says they would like to find Gods perfect will for their lives and that they want to be in the center of His will just send them to the center of His Word Psalms NKJV It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man Now isnt that odd how this worked out or was God in the center of it Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at To unsubscribe write to
